definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with

sentences.english: Internal Ratings-Based (IRB) approach is the core of the New Basel Accord.
sentences.chinese: 內部評級法是巴塞爾新資本協議的核心。

sentences.english: Basel Town is just 200 meters from our hotel.
sentences.chinese: 巴塞爾鎮距離酒店僅有200米。

sentences.english: While at Basel I had some conversation with Edith in regard to your attentions to her.
sentences.chinese: 在巴塞爾時我曾和伊迪絲談了關於你對她獻熱情的事。

sentences.english: Zwingli was soon called from Basel to enter upon his lifework.
sentences.chinese: 不久，薩文黎從巴塞爾被召去從事他一生的工作。

sentences.english: And you've quite possibly never even heard of Basel III.
sentences.chinese: 而且你恐怕也從來沒聽過什麼叫巴塞爾公約III。

sentences.english: In2004 he performed with the basle philharmonic orchestra during a concert tour in china.
sentences.chinese: 2004年，他隨巴塞爾交響樂團在中國進行巡演。

sentences.english: At Zürich, Basle, and Berne the same laws were established.
sentences.chinese: 在蘇黎世，巴塞爾，伯爾尼和同樣的法律已經確定。

sentences.english: The practice was left nearly untouched by the Basel III agreement.
sentences.chinese: 巴塞爾III協議對這種行爲幾乎毫無提及。

definition: the curtain falls/lower the curtain/to come to an end (of a meeting)
to exhibit at or take part in a trade show etc
the duration of a conference/the period over which a conference (or expo etc) is held/session/the date of a meeting
conferences and exhibitions, abbr. of 會議展覽|会议展览[hui4 yi4 zhan3 lan3]
